Html:
Hi there,

This looks like a really useful plugin, thanks!

I think the answer to this question is "no", but is there any way to programmatically set the star's colour? 

I'd like to have the rating show up in red for 1-3, amber for 4 and green for 5...

Rachel

It is possible, just not programmatically. just make the star picture 5 stars wide instead of 1 and color them the way you want.

Gidon
